entities.description: Flag variable for over-the-counter (OTC) cold medication usage reporting
Indicator for whether the respondent has ever used GHB
Time since last use of GHB
Indicator for whether the respondent has ever used a needle to inject cocaine
Time since last use of a needle to inject cocaine

relationships.description: Relates the survey to the flag variable for OTC cold medication usage reporting
Indicates whether the respondent has ever used GHB
Indicates the time since the respondent last used GHB
Indicates whether the respondent has ever used a needle to inject cocaine
Indicates the time since the respondent last used a needle to inject cocaine
